title: crea8iveant
author: crea8iveant
content: I don't know how to say this but I am getting goosebumps every time I rewatch this trailer and I can't get enough of it. 10 years waited for this. Brings so many memories from my childhood. That Vice city sunset vibes and ..... RIP to those who couldn't make it till 2023.Here's the link of Rockstar's Official Trailer 1:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdBZY2fkU-0

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Thanks for the link but we've got a thread already about it on this section as well and we've been waiting for that. This thread --> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5473298.0Much better if we continue the discussions there about the said trailer and the other members have been there as well waiting for the release. Anyway, it's another version that we'll wait for 2024.
